title: Heat Equation Stein Variational Ensemble: Rethinking and Advancing Uncertainty-Aware Soft Sensor Modeling
details: Y Ma, Z Chen, Z Yang, X Zhang, Z Song - IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, 2024
abstract: Data-driven soft sensors have been prevalent in industrial key performance indicator prediction. However, rigorously quantifying the uncertainty of predictions has been consistently neglected. This neglect can result in industrial practitioners being …
